synopsis.text: Weekly Shonen Jump's manga-turned-anime, Otoko Ippiki Gaki Daishou, follows the unconventional journey of junior high student Mankichi Togawa and his one-eyed ally, Ginji. With a relentless ambition to become Japan's top gang leader, the duo embarks on a series of thrilling escapades filled with trouble and action-packed fights. Aired Monday through Saturday, each 10-minute episode unravels the gripping tale of their quest for dominance in the world of gangs.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
